content: In Thunderbird, move emails you want to keep to a local folder and then delete the rest. This keeps your important emails in Thunderbird but not on the server. Dog blog
creator: ShaunaB1

content:
I stumbled on a reply from @toad-hall from 2016 which fixed the issue:

[[When I forward an email, a table of info is automatically generated in the body of the mail. How can I stop this?|https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1148429#question-reply]]
creator: vhewa

content:
115.10.1 should be available on Thursday to resolve this.

Until then, you can install and use https://archive.mozilla.org/pub/thunderbird/releases/115.9.0/
creator: wsmwk
